about_the_game:
GuruGuru is a physics-based multiplayer party brawling game. Supporting up to 8 players, you can team up with your friends in a 4-player squad to battle against the others or engage in intense 2-8 player showdowns in custom rooms.

Become a GuruGuru!

In this world, all animals have transformed into GuruGuru creatures—round and incredibly agile! Take control of your GuruGuru, maneuvering it like a racing car, drifting, dashing, and colliding with style!



Unleash Over-the-Top Special Moves!

GuruGuru can accumulate energy through collisions and unleash powerful special moves. Perform a high-speed spin to create a tornado that sucks in everything around, or take a deep breath and transform into a giant form, punching away everyone in front. There are various types of supercharged specials, such as black holes and bubble guns. Coordinate with your friends and unleash them simultaneously to create chaos at the party!

Multiple Maps and Modes!

From rooftop to bread factory, even your living room can become a playground for them!

Wait There's More

Interactive world based on physics engine: Everything can be picked up and used as a weapon, even your friends!
Unexpected power-ups: To increase the chaos at the party, items will constantly spawn during battles.



Now is the time! Gather your friends and become GuruGuru!
detailed_description:
Welcome to the Guru Guru Community!

Join our Guru Guru Discord
Participate in activities and discussions!
Provide feedback on the gameplay and let's make this game even more enjoyable together!
Discord:
QQ group: 711254936

name: Guru Guru

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit / Windows 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750-Ti / AMD RX 550, 2GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit / Windows 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7500K / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580, 4GB VRam / Intel Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Guru Guru is an 8-player physics-based party game. You and your friends become round and adorable GuruGuru monster, unleashing wild combo moves and smashing your opponents, or YOUR FRIENDS!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
